name: Boss's Good Employee
description:
This is a game created by Thomas Wang & Xinran Liu, and we want this game to simulate the relationship between the boss and employees. 

It requires two players to play this game, one would play the role of boss and the other would play the role of employee. Each player should not see the other part of the screen, so you might need a book or plate to play this game. You should also prepare a mic that would work before the game starts because it would affect the obstacles.

Just follow the instructions and find out what to do during your work time, then maybe you could have fun.
